parameters: ・ ・ ・ ・ ・ ・ Who is he?
・ ・ ・ ・ ・ ・ I remember Menoko.
・ ・ ・ ・ ・ ・ Menoko, help me, help me.
I was tortured a lot and put in here.
Others have also been tortured and trapped a lot.
I want to get out of here, I'll be killed, no, no ...
In the next room, I had a good friend of mine. Please help me ...
He ... gathers girls, afflicts them, and kills them.
And take out the red soul from the girl.
He said that the more you are suffering, the richer your soul will be.
I want to take revenge somehow ...
... Thank you, he surely has the key here.
If you help me, I'll ask you anything.
Why ... betrayed ... I heard from him ...
All the other children were eaten by him ...
After that, I'm the only one, because ... uh, I'm scared ... uh, uh ...
But ... how are you going to open this door ...?
You can't open it without a key and a strong knife ...
Only me, but was it saved ...?
Thank you, really, thank you, Menoko ...
Eh ... te, should I go home with a teleporter?
After all ... I can't help ... It's just like this ...

I broke my head with Nemami.
